channel.title: New 742 rsps with great economy! ~looking for staff!~
channel.description:
NEW SERVER WITH A GREAT ECONOMY! ~LOOKING FOR STAFF!~ Immersive 742 is a new server with amazing content coming everyday! We on Immersive have a great development team that does daily updates and takes the communities' recomendation and makes it happen. Our staff are experienced and active everyday to give you the best experience on Immersive. Our mission is to create a server that fits your gaming style from having multiple great bosses, flawless player-to-player combat, staking, and gambling. We have some custom items for the players that like to see unique things, our G.E. is 100% working, it is Player-To-Player so everything runs smoothly. Our Duel Arena is fully working with staking. Immersive has a fully working Lending Item system to players.. We have fully working clans for the people that like to get with friends and pvm, or even player kill. There is a spirit tree at home that will teleport you around the world to Skilling Zones, Bosses, Minigames, Player Killing, and Slayer. All 24 skills work 100% with working Skill Capes and 200m XP skill capes. We have just about every minigame you can think of working 100%! In Immersive 742 we have tons of training places for your skill level and for higher XP rates! We have a trusted Gambling rank system with Anti-Scam features implemented. Immersives home is at the Grand Exchange and has tons of shops to fit all of your needs no matter what type of gaming you plan on doing! There is also 3 levels of donator with great features for all.
~~ Our Bosses~~ ~All GodWars(Bandos, Saradomin, Armadyl, Zamorak, and Nex) ~Corporal Beast ~Kalphite Queen ~Queen Black Dragon ~Tormented Demons ~Bork ~Barrelchest ~Dagannoth Kings ~Vorago ~Party Demon ~Blink(Drops Tier 90 items and Rares) ~Darious ~And Special Donator Boss(Drops Rares etc.) ~We do plan on adding more!
We on Immersive have tons of great features and are completely willing to make adjustments and take recommendations from players at all levels. Although as said before we have a dedicated staff team we are still currently looking to fill staff spots at all levels, we are looking for dedicated players to help expand the server and keep making it better everyday. We hope to see you in game. Thank you for taking the time to read our adveritsement.
Our forums page is currently under development and I will update this post in the very near future when the forums page is finished. If you have any questions, comments,or concerns feel free to message the Owner or Co-owner on skype @ Doomedlegacy.cory or Splash0625.
Client Download(.jar): https://dl.dropbox.com/s/t73dq3eyslwmq7l/Immersive742.jar?dl=0

item.description:
@Immersive742 wrote:

NEW SERVER WITH A GREAT ECONOMY! ~LOOKING FOR STAFF!~
Immersive 742 is a new server with amazing content coming everyday!
We on Immersive have a great development team that does daily updates
and takes the communities’ recomendation and makes it happen.
Our staff are experienced and active everyday to give you the
best experience on Immersive.
Our mission is to create a server that fits your gaming style
from having multiple great bosses, flawless player-to-player combat,
staking, and gambling.
We have some custom items for the players that like to see unique things,
our G.E. is 100% working, it is Player-To-Player so everything runs smoothly.
Our Duel Arena is fully working with staking.
Immersive has a fully working Lending Item system to players…
We have fully working clans for the people that like to get
with friends and pvm, or even player kill.
There is a spirit tree at home that will teleport you around the world
to Skilling Zones, Bosses, Minigames, Player Killing, and Slayer.
All 24 skills work 100% with working Skill Capes and 200m XP skill capes.
We have just about every minigame you can think of working 100%!
In Immersive 742 we have tons of training places for your skill level and for higher XP rates!
We have a trusted Gambling rank system with Anti-Scam features implemented.
Immersives home is at the Grand Exchange and has tons of shops to fit all of
your needs no matter what type of gaming you plan on doing!
There is also 3 levels of donator with great features for all.

~~ Our Bosses~~
~All GodWars(Bandos, Saradomin, Armadyl, Zamorak, and Nex)
~Corporal Beast
~Kalphite Queen
~Queen Black Dragon
~Tormented Demons
~Bork
~Barrelchest
~Dagannoth Kings
~Vorago
~Party Demon
~Blink(Drops Tier 90 items and Rares)
~Darious
~And Special Donator Boss(Drops Rares etc.)
~We do plan on adding more!

We on Immersive have tons of great features and are completely willing to

make adjustments and take recommendations from players at all levels. Although as said before we
have a dedicated staff team we are still currently looking to fill staff spots at all levels, we
are looking for dedicated players to help expand the server and keep making it better everyday.
We hope to see you in game. Thank you for taking the time to read our adveritsement.

Our forums page is currently under development and I will update this post in the very near

future when the forums page is finished. If you have any questions, comments,or concerns feel
free to message the Owner or Co-owner on skype @ Doomedlegacy.cory or Splash0625.
